Thanks for this great torrent. I got the original vinyl of this album but no player now. With this files I'm satisfied!
Yes 1974 I was 17 and this was the soundtrack for looking for love.
A nice reminder.
One of my favorite albums of all time. Gates is one of Yes' best songs as well. 1974...yea I was 10 years old! Wow....memories.
